head.title: New website!
head.description: We have a new website, built with the latest technology! It is faster, easier to navigate, and simpler. Just as before, it is open source.â€¦

body:
We have a new website, built with the latest technology! It is faster, easier to navigate, and simpler. Just as before, it is open source.

If you find anything amiss, please open an issue.

Hope you like it!
